summary: Build a company website for RS LOGISTICS OF TRANSPORT BUSINESS (Bishnupur, Guwahati, Assam 781018) focused on transport of coal, agriculture, and goods.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the company name “RS LOGISTICS OF TRANSPORT BUSINESS” and clearly state the location “Bishnupur, Guwahati, Assam 781018” and the core focus: transport of coal, agriculture, and goods.

Add core pages/sections suitable for a logistics company website: Home (hero + quick service highlights), About (company overview), Services (coal/agriculture/goods transport), Service Area (Bishnupur/Guwahati/Assam callout), and Contact (address and contact methods).

Implement a Contact form UI (Name, Phone, Email, Message) that validates required fields on the client and shows a clear success/failure state; if backend submission is not implemented, provide clear contact alternatives on the page (e.g., “Call us” and “Email us” placeholders) in English.

Define and apply a coherent visual theme appropriate for a transport/logistics business (e.g., industrial/earthy palette using charcoal/graphite, safety-orange accents, off-white backgrounds; strong typography; consistent spacing and section hierarchy) and apply it consistently across all pages/sections.
Add a site footer that repeats the company name and location and includes quick links to the main sections (Home/About/Services/Contact).

Add the required generated images to the project as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., logo in header/footer; hero image/illustration in the home hero section).

Update the Contact section content to display the founder name "RAJU SARKAR" with title "Founder", and replace the placeholder phone number with "+91 8135954933". Ensure all user-facing text remains in English and that the phone number is presented clearly (preferably as a clickable tel: link).

Update the site footer contact details to replace the placeholder phone number with "+91 8135954933" and include founder identification "RAJU SARKAR" with title "Founder" in the footer’s contact/company info area. Ensure all user-facing text remains in English.
Update the contact form phone field placeholder text to reflect the provided phone format (use "+91 8135954933" as the example), while keeping validation behavior unchanged.
